text: messenger is one of the frequent aps i use in my phone messenger help me with my school work that is why messenger is important to me also messenger give me easy communication with my relative but i just noticed that in the older version of messenger when i send chronological picture the receiver would receive the picture in order using the new update when i send a picture that should follow an order a friend would receive it jumble i would like to ask if it has something to do with the new update
original_text: Messenger is one of the frequent apps I use in my phone. It helps me with my school work that's why it is important to me. Also it give me easy communication with my relatives. But I just noticed that in the older version of messenger when I send chronological pictures the receiver would receive the pictures in order. Using the new update, when I send a picture that should follow an order a friend would receive it jumble. I would like to ask if it has something to do with the new update.

text: using it with goole pixel phone there are so many issue with this application take forever to go online if network switch on the phone it is close to a minute even though internet was back almost instantly it is faster to kill the application and restart the application terrible with bluetooth headphone all other aps start playing to headphone when all other aps are connected not this one it is to special i need to manually select output device to be bt headphone and even then of the time sound doe not go to headphone i need to reconnect my headphone every time for the application for some reason if i was using headphone quality of the call would degrade to not usable video was like frame with terrible quality sound was not distinguishable at all instantly becomes better when output is set to speaker sound mess up with sound control after using sound this morning i could not get bt headphone to play sound no matter what i do with system setting even though i could see device connected everything start working after i force exit messenger it was in the background not in a call just idling who care about other functionality when basic call doe not work properly
original_text: (using it with google pixel phone) There are so many issues with this app. 1. takes forever to go online if network switches on the phone. It is close to a minute even though internet was back almost instantly. It is faster to kill the app and restart it.  2. terrible with bluetooth headphones. All other apps start playing to headphones when they are connected. Not this one. It is to special. I need to manually select output device to be BT headphones. And even then 90% of the time sound doesn't go to headphones. I need to reconnect my headphones every time for this app.  3. For some reason if I was using headphones quality of the call would degrade to not usable. Video was like 2 frames with terrible quality. Sound was not distinguishable at all. Instantly becomes better when output is set to speakers.  4. It messes up with sound controls. After using it this morning I couldn't get BT headphons to play sound. No matter what I do with system settings. Even though I could see device connected. Everything starts working after I force exit messenger. It was in the background not in a call. Just idling.  Who cares about other functionality when basic calls doesn't work properly.
